Join Us. Let’s make a direct impact in healthcare.Being an Iodine employee means becoming part of something bigger: using clinical AI technology to drive smarter healthcare processes and positively impact patient care.Who We AreIodine is an enterprise AI company that is championing a radical rethink of how to create value for healthcare professionals, leaders, and their organizations: automating complex clinical tasks, generating insights, and empowering intelligent care. Powered by one of the largest sets of clinical data and use cases available, our groundbreaking clinical machine-learning engine, Cognitive ML, constantly ingests the patient record to generate real-time, highly focused, predictive insights that clinicians and hospital administrators can leverage to dramatically augment the management of care delivery.What We’re Looking ForIodine Software is seeking another Vice President, Data Sciences to join the team!What You’ll DoAs a Vice President of Data Sciences at Iodine, you will focus on 4 key areas responsibility:Innovation Investigate new technologies and their applicability to augment existing products or develop new productsHelp define product technical viability in combination with Product strategy and executive teamclarify the capabilities of new technologies and their potential applicationsidentify what problems are tractable given the capabilities of currently available technologies and estimate effort and gaps we'd need to filldefine technical requirements - technical definition of the problem we're trying to solve, possible approaches, metrics for successImplement proof of concept applications of AI technologies to problems we're trying to solveTechnical Execution oversee efforts of data science teambrainstorm on approaches and experimentsvalidate approachreview findings and evaluate readinessmentorshipM&A / Partnerships evaluate technology of potential partners / acquisition targetswhere does it overlap and where does it augment our offerings?How technically sound is it? probe likely weak pointwhat holes in our current offering or new use cases would adding this technology allow us to address identify technological gaps in our current capabilities and provide guidance to strategy team of what types of technologies to look forThought LeadershipParticipate in calls with analysts, prospects and customers to communicate our approach and our differentiationBe a thought leader and support our AI leadership capabilitiesWhat We’d Love To SeeMinimum Requirements (Education, certifications, and experience):BS from an accredited institution in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field with a minimum of 10 years of professional experience5+ years experience managing a teamWorking knowledge of PythonWorking knowledge of PyTorchFamiliarity with NLP problems and approaches - particularly around concept extraction, human language understanding and summarizationFamiliarity with transformers, attention, and large language models (LLM)Experience applying different ML techniques and approaches - classification, regression, clustering, dimensional reduction, oversampling / sample weightingWhat We OfferHealth Benefits Package: Medical, Vision, DentalTelehealthPharmacy ResourcesSavings and Spending AccountsLife & AD&D InsuranceDisability InsuranceTravel Assistance and ID Theft ProtectionAccident InsuranceCritical Illness InsuranceHospital Indemnity InsurancePet InsuranceEmployee Assistance ProgramLifestyle Spending BenefitLegal Plan401(k) Retirement Savings Plan and MatchWhy should you join Iodine?This is a unique opportunity to join a close-knit, rapidly growing team and help us improve a key piece of the organization. You will have the opportunity to drive smarter healthcare processes through technology, so hospitals can stay focused on patient care. You will join a passionate and ambitious team, with a proven record of success building multiple companies. Learn more about our company culture on Built In Austin and on our website at www.iodinesoftware.com.At Iodine Software, we don’t just accept DIFFERENCE — we celebrate it, we support it, and we flourish on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. We pride ourselves to be an equal opportunity workplace and are an affirmative action employer and a member of E-verify.**You must be currently authorized to work full-time in the United States**
